task.title: Configuring the Registration UI
task.abstract: Staff users need to configure the registration UI in order to enable portal users to register for an event. Configuring the registration UI is achieved through the Event record and the Event Campaign Page(s).

step.cmd: Navigate to the Event record and populate the Display Name, Venue/Location Name, Location Information, and Image URL fields. Click Save.
step.info: To allow group registration for an event, select the Enable Registration Groups checkbox and the appropriate option from the Registration Group Type picklist.

step.cmd: Navigate to each ticket type and select the Is Active and Is Published checkboxes in order for the ticket types to display in the registration UI. Click Save on each Ticket Type record.
